lyrics:
2 contributorsshow you off tonight lyricsintro
damn girl looking so pretty
hows about a little drive to the city
i want to show you off

verse 1
i know you like it
that im shy and kinda quiet
but tonight i
i kinda dont want to be
the way you walked in
painted red lips
the way that red dress
is hugging up on your hips
i want the whole world to see

long as youre dancing with me
